entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
